attributes.action: Ban anti-piracy adverts from cinemas and DVDs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of the public attending cinema performances or buying DVDs should not have their time stolen by being forced to watch anti-piracy adverts before films at the cinema or on DVD.  People in cinemas are not watching a pirate film and have paid money not to have their time wasted. People watching a DVD may be watching a pirate copy, but if they are then the anti-piracy advert will probably have been edited out anyway, so it only affects legitimate purchasers.  Ban these waste of time adverts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
